rrdworld.name: SICM - Simple Infrastructure Capacity Monitor
rrdworld.author: Thomas Price
rrdworld.description: Written in Perl for Win32 & Linux (easily ported to other O/S's). SICM provides a template based ping & snmp front-end to RRDtool that is simple to implement & support, is flexible and provides www, menu driven presentation of the output as well as e-mail alerting.
